text: Isn’t this kind of already achievable through the cli? Just copying fields.Json and pasting it where you want it?

X-Post from the Ideas forum. Let’s send this one to the Moon, too :rocket: (right after I turn off email notifications) <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Fetch-Create-Update-Custom-Properties-via-HubSpot-CLI/idi-p/452233>
